reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan comfortable and soft, with one noting it's not scratchy or stiff. The sweater receives positive feedback for its fit, with one customer mentioning it hits just at the waist, and they appreciate its versatility, with one describing it as a cozy house sweater. Customers like the color, with one noting the grey shade has a slight green tinge, and they find it warm, with one mentioning it's pe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater
items.body: I love this sweater. It is actually very warm even though it is a knit cardigan. I get lots of compliments on it. The quality is great. Fits true to size and the color is a beautiful cream color. It has washed well. Read more
items.author: Kelli

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, oversized, cute!
items.body: Appealing, slouchy, midweight cardigan. Definitely oversized as described, so size down if you like a closer fit. The fabric isn't super soft, but it's still comfortable, not scratchy or stiff. I liked it enough that I've already bought it again in another color and I'm considering a third, so if you're on the fence, take this as your sign and go ahead and get it! Read more
items.author: R.e.Mc

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Squishy and Comfy
items.body: The sweater is cute and very at, but is not asking long as shown in pictures Read more
items.author: Renee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, soft, warm and so comfortable.
items.body: I absolutely Love these sweaters, so much so that I bought a few in different colors. They're so soft and comfortable! The raglan sleeves make for a great fit, they're roomy but not baggy and run true to size. I haven't tried washing any of them yet but I'm pretty confident when I do they should come out fine as I always wash my sweaters in a laundry bag on the gentle cycle with Woolite. Read more
items.author: Doc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweaters
items.body: I have bought two of these. Fabulous sweaters. Washes great and dry great. Warm and beautiful colors. Read more
items.author: Sandy Richardson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, but it’s short n length for tall people
items.body: I was so excited to get this sweater but it didn’t fit like the model in the pic. I expected baggy and a longer fit. It was baggy but it had more of a square fit. I’m 5’8” and it hit me at the waist. It’s cute just too short. The quality was really nice. I did return it with no problems. Read more
items.author: Alisha Burns

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and comfort
items.body: Great fit and material is thick enough for fall temps. Not heavy to wear and the style is very complimentary. Good value for the money. Holds up very well when cleaned. Read more
items.author: Ella

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color
items.body: Fits well. Good quality. Read more
items.author: Kristin Carl

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Smoke Green, Gray, Beige, Racing Red, Moss Green, Real Teal, Black, Cinnamon, Coffee, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
